title: Date Time
description: The date, time, date time or other date time value.

value.description: The particular point in the progression of time.

format.description: The format of the date/time content. The default format is the standard combined date and time representation as defined in the ISO 8601. The language of format is the one defined in the same ISO 8601. See https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:std:iso:8601:-1:ed-1:v1:en
